roleset.name: suffer and work

example.name: they're all like this??
example.text: Meanwhile, bond investors are laboring under the onus of a national debt ceiling debate.
example.arg: under the onus of a national debt ceiling debate

roleset.note: I will be curious to see if this verb occurs in any other contexts (ie, other than "labor under").

roleset.name: Give birth

example.name: Manner example
example.text: After [PRO] laboring prematurely, I spent 3 months in bed.

roleset.note: Roelset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet or framenet mappings. Framed by Katie.

roleset.name: to belabor, make more difficult

example.name: All arguments, typical usage
example.text: In many entries , Claiborne labors the obvious , offering little or nothing we do not already know , could easily imagine , or for which the author offers no explanation .
example.arg: offering little or nothing we do not already know, could easily imagine, or for which the author offers no explanation.
